Interactive Features of Loss Data Analytics Preface

Interactive Features of Loss Data Analytics An open text authored by the Actuarial Community Preface Date: 06 July 2022 This repository describes interactive features of the Loss Data Analytics text that are being developed, in process, and in the planning stages. By interactive features, we start with simple things like layering content (such as Show/Hide way of displaying code below) and moving on from there. R Code for Frequency Table Insample <- read.csv("Insample.csv", header=T, na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE) Insample2010 <- subset(Insample, Year==2010) table(Insample2010$Freq)
